stories.text: For those who study or work remotely, once you run out of attention, how do you manage the transition to getting back to work?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you manage remote work breaks?
Google Maps Is Wrongly Telling People I-80 Closed; Reroutes People to Colorado

stories.text:
Hi YC family,

Have you ever forgotten where you got a particular information from when you needed it the most? Being researchers, we face this issue on a regular basis as a typical research life involves years of effort reading and writing research papers.

That’s why we, a team of scholars from IISER Mohali & IISc Bangalore, have built ResNote (resnote.com) . Using our chrome extension, you can take notes anywhere from the web with a simple drag and drop or a right click; and all your relevant information will be saved along with their source automatically. Along with this, we have 2 more AI products in the suite to summarize YouTube videos and to convert your handwritten notes into typed notes just by uploading a photo. This can ultimately help you organize your references and thereby will save you a lot of time in reading and writing research papers (50x faster). Also, you no longer need to download tons of pdfs that just lie unopened on your laptop.

It has been a privilege being associated with YC community and as a form of gratitude, we are sending you exclusive 3 months pro-usage coupons (worth $10/month each) for all the professors, students, academicians, lawyers who are dealing with all sorts of research. Kindly use "YCPRO3" as your referral coupon code while creating an account at resnote.com or add this code in your profile section.

Visit: resnote.com

Regards, Saswat Pattnaik https://www.linkedin.com/in/saswat-pattnaik-b82b1316a/ (+91) 8283016334
